sub_topic: Balancing chemical equations for inorganic compounds
message_1: Write the balanced chemical equation for the reaction of sodium chloride (NaCl) with sulfuric acid (H2SO4) to form sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) and hydrochloric acid (HCl).
